title: Can't hear other person in phone calls and no audio from YouTube/Spotify etc
content:
My 3a just fell in the bath for all of 1 second. Phone seems to be working as normal, except I can't hear the other person during a phone call, unless I turn speaker on. Also no audio is playing when i use YouTube, Spotify or similar.

When connected to a Bluetooth device audio works for both phone calls and media.

Have tried loading the phone in safe mode with no luck.

Any help would be much appreciated!
